top_100_views.title: T1 vs NS Highlights | 2025 LoL KeSPA Cup

analysis.title_strategy: Keywords: '2025', 'Official', 'Teaser', 'Highlights'. Emotional hooks: Anticipation, Rivalry (T1 vs NS), Nostalgia.
analysis.thumbnail_pattern: High contrast, close-up faces with strong expressions, red/blue/gold color schemes, minimal text.
analysis.target_audience: Gen Z (18-24) and Millennials (25-34), Interest: K-Pop, Gaming, Drama

viral_proposals.title: Nano Banana vs. The World: Spicy Noodle Challenge
viral_proposals.description: A high-energy challenge video where the cute Nano Banana mascot attempts the spicy noodle challenge, reacting with animated effects.
viral_proposals.script: Intro: Nano Banana holds up spicy noodles. Cut to cooking. Eating: Face turns red, steam comes out (VFX). Conclusion: Passes out cutely.
viral_proposals.image_prompt: Nano Banana mascot face red with steam, holding spicy noodles, comic style
viral_proposals.video_prompt1: Nano Banana eating spicy noodles, 3d animation
viral_proposals.video_prompt2: Nano Banana breathing fire, cute style
viral_proposals.video_prompt3: Nano Banana giving thumbs up, sweating

viral_proposals.title: ASMR: Nano Banana Peeling & Slicing (Satisfying)
viral_proposals.description: Relaxing ASMR video of Nano Banana (the character) doing satisfying tasks like slicing kinetic sand or peeling fruits.
viral_proposals.script: No dialogue. Soft sounds of slicing sand, tapping on glass. Nano Banana whispers 'So satisfying' at the end.
viral_proposals.image_prompt: Nano Banana holding a knife and kinetic sand, soft lighting, pastel colors
viral_proposals.video_prompt1: Nano Banana slicing kinetic sand, close up
viral_proposals.video_prompt2: Nano Banana tapping on glass, asmr

viral_proposals.title: Nano Banana's K-Pop Dance Cover: Soda Pop
viral_proposals.description: The mascot dances to the #1 trending song 'Soda Pop' by Saja Boys.
viral_proposals.script: Full body shot of Nano Banana dancing the choreography perfectly. Background changes with the beat.
viral_proposals.image_prompt: Nano Banana in K-pop idol outfit, stage lights, dancing pose
viral_proposals.video_prompt1: Nano Banana dancing to upbeat music, smooth animation
viral_proposals.video_prompt3: Nano Banana with backup dancer bananas
